  1. """Templatetags for the ``subscribe`` app."""
  2. from django import template
  3. from django.contrib.contenttypes.models import ContentType
  5. from ..models import Subscription
  8. register = template.Library()
  11. @register.assignment_tag
  12. def get_ctype(obj):
  13. """
  14. Returns the ``ContentType`` for the given object.
  16. :param obj: Any object.
  18. """
  19. return ContentType.objects.get_for_model(obj)
  22. @register.assignment_tag
  23. def get_subscribers(obj):
  24. """
  25. Returns the subscribers for a given object.
  27. :param obj: Any object.
  29. """
  30. ctype = ContentType.objects.get_for_model(obj)
  31. return Subscription.objects.filter(content_type=ctype, object_id=obj.pk)
  34. @register.assignment_tag
  35. def is_subscribed(user, obj):
  36. """
  37. Returns ``True`` if the user is subscribed to the given object.
  39. :param user: A ``User`` instance.
  40. :param obj: Any object.
  42. """
  43. if not user.is_authenticated():
  44. return False
  46. ctype = ContentType.objects.get_for_model(obj)
  48. try:
  49. Subscription.objects.get(
  50. user=user, content_type=ctype, object_id=obj.pk)
  51. except Subscription.DoesNotExist:
  52. return False
  54. return True
